definition_en: A common greeting when meeting someone.
definition_pt: Uma saudação comum ao encontrar alguém.
example: Hello! How are you today?

definition_en: Used when leaving or ending a conversation.
definition_pt: Usado ao sair ou encerrar uma conversa.
example: Goodbye! See you tomorrow!

definition_en: Used to give an affirmative answer.
definition_pt: Usado para dar uma resposta afirmativa.
example: Yes, I like ice cream.

definition_en: Used to give a negative answer.
definition_pt: Usado para dar uma resposta negativa.
example: No, I don't want coffee.

definition_en: Polite word used when asking for something.
definition_pt: Palavra educada usada ao pedir algo.
example: Can I have water, please?

definition_en: Expressing gratitude.
definition_pt: Expressando gratidão.
example: Thank you for your help!

definition_en: Used to apologize.
definition_pt: Usado para pedir desculpas.
example: Sorry, I'm late.

definition_en: First person singular pronoun.
definition_pt: Pronome da primeira pessoa do singular.
example: I am a student.

definition_en: Second person pronoun (singular/plural).
definition_pt: Pronome da segunda pessoa (singular/plural).
example: You are my friend.

definition_en: Third person singular masculine pronoun.
definition_pt: Pronome masculino da terceira pessoa do singular.
example: He is my brother.

definition_en: Third person singular feminine pronoun.
definition_pt: Pronome feminino da terceira pessoa do singular.
example: She is a doctor.

definition_en: Third person singular neuter pronoun.
definition_pt: Pronome neutro da terceira pessoa do singular.
example: It is a cat.

definition_en: First person plural pronoun.
definition_pt: Pronome da primeira pessoa do plural.
example: We are happy.

definition_en: Third person plural pronoun.
definition_pt: Pronome da terceira pessoa do plural.
example: They are my parents.

definition_en: Question word for information.
definition_pt: Palavra de pergunta para informação.
example: What is your name?

definition_en: Question word for people.
definition_pt: Palavra de pergunta para pessoas.
example: Who is that?

definition_en: Question word for places.
definition_pt: Palavra de pergunta para lugares.
example: Where is the bathroom?

definition_en: Question word for time.
definition_pt: Palavra de pergunta para tempo.
example: When is your birthday?

definition_en: Question word for reason.
definition_pt: Palavra de pergunta para razão.
example: Why are you sad?

definition_en: Question word for manner/condition.
definition_pt: Palavra de pergunta para modo/condição.
example: How are you?

definition_en: Demonstrative for something near.
definition_pt: Demonstrativo para algo próximo.
example: This is my book.

definition_en: Demonstrative for something far.
definition_pt: Demonstrativo para algo distante.
example: That is her house.

definition_en: In this place.
definition_pt: Neste lugar.
example: Come here, please.

definition_en: In that place.
definition_pt: Naquele lugar.
example: The keys are there.

definition_en: At the present time.
definition_pt: No momento presente.
example: I'm busy now.

definition_en: At a time in the future.
definition_pt: Em um tempo no futuro.
example: See you later!

definition_en: On this day.
definition_pt: Neste dia.
example: Today is Monday.

definition_en: On the day after today.
definition_pt: No dia depois de hoje.
example: We have a test tomorrow.

definition_en: On the day before today.
definition_pt: No dia antes de hoje.
example: Yesterday was Sunday.

definition_en: Of high quality or pleasant.
definition_pt: De alta qualidade ou agradável.
example: This is a good movie.

definition_en: Of poor quality or unpleasant.
definition_pt: De baixa qualidade ou desagradável.
example: The weather is bad today.

definition_en: Large in size.
definition_pt: De tamanho grande.
example: They have a big house.

definition_en: Little in size.
definition_pt: De tamanho pequeno.
example: I have a small dog.

definition_en: Having high temperature.
definition_pt: Com temperatura alta.
example: The coffee is too hot.

definition_en: Having low temperature.
definition_pt: Com temperatura baixa.
example: The water is cold.

definition_en: Recently made or acquired.
definition_pt: Feito ou adquirido recentemente.
example: I have a new phone.

definition_en: Having existed for a long time.
definition_pt: Existindo há muito tempo.
example: This is an old building.

definition_en: Feeling pleasure or joy.
definition_pt: Sentindo prazer ou alegria.
example: She looks happy today.

definition_en: Feeling sorrow or unhappiness.
definition_pt: Sentindo tristeza ou infelicidade.
example: Why are you sad?

definition_en: Not closed or to make not closed.
definition_pt: Não fechado ou fazer não estar fechado.
example: Please open the window.

definition_en: Shut or to make shut.
definition_pt: Fechado ou fazer estar fechado.
example: Close the door, please.

definition_en: Towards a higher position.
definition_pt: Em direção a uma posição mais alta.
example: Look up at the sky.

definition_en: Towards a lower position.
definition_pt: Em direção a uma posição mais baixa.
example: Sit down, please.

definition_en: Contained by something.
definition_pt: Contido por algo.
example: The book is in the bag.

definition_en: Not inside.
definition_pt: Não dentro.
example: Let's go out tonight.

definition_en: Opposite of right direction.
definition_pt: Oposto da direção direita.
example: Turn left at the traffic light.

definition_en: Opposite of left direction.
definition_pt: Oposto da direção esquerda.
example: The bank is on the right.

definition_en: Adult human male.
definition_pt: Macho humano adulto.
example: That man is my father.

definition_en: Adult human female.
definition_pt: Fêmea humana adulta.
example: The woman is reading a book.

definition_en: Young human male.
definition_pt: Macho humano jovem.
example: The boy is playing soccer.

definition_en: Young human female.
definition_pt: Fêmea humana jovem.
example: The girl is wearing a red dress.

definition_en: A set of written or printed pages bound together.
definition_pt: Um conjunto de páginas escritas ou impressas encadernadas.
example: I borrowed a book from the library.

definition_en: A person living next door or nearby.
definition_pt: Uma pessoa que mora ao lado ou nas proximidades.
example: My neighbor waters my plants when I'm away.

definition_en: A device used for protection against rain.
definition_pt: Um objeto usado para proteção contra a chuva.
example: Don't forget to take your umbrella, it's raining.

definition_en: To take something temporarily with permission.
definition_pt: Pegar algo temporariamente com permissão.
example: Can I borrow your pen for a moment?

definition_en: To give something temporarily to someone.
definition_pt: Dar algo temporariamente a alguém.
example: I can lend you my book if you need it.

definition_en: Providing physical ease and relaxation.
definition_pt: Que proporciona facilidade física e relaxamento.
example: These new shoes are very comfortable.

definition_en: An arrangement to meet someone at a particular time.
definition_pt: Um acordo para encontrar alguém em um horário específico.
example: I have a doctor's appointment at 3 PM.

definition_en: A written acknowledgment of having received something.
definition_pt: Um reconhecimento por escrito de ter recebido algo.
example: Keep the receipt in case you need to return the item.

definition_en: A line of people waiting for something.
definition_pt: Uma linha de pessoas esperando por algo.
example: There was a long queue at the bus stop.

definition_en: Not polite; offensive or embarrassing.
definition_pt: Não educado; ofensivo ou embaraçoso.
example: It's rude to interrupt people when they're speaking.

definition_en: Having good manners; courteous.
definition_pt: Que tem boas maneiras; cortês.
example: He was very polite and held the door for me.

definition_en: Large movable objects used to make a room usable.
definition_pt: Objetos grandes móveis usados para tornar um cômodo utilizável.
example: We need to buy new furniture for the living room.

definition_en: The act of bringing goods to someone.
definition_pt: O ato de levar mercadorias a alguém.
example: The pizza delivery arrived in 30 minutes.

definition_en: To express dissatisfaction or annoyance.
definition_pt: Expressar insatisfação ou aborrecimento.
example: She complained about the noisy neighbors.

definition_en: An unusual and exciting experience.
definition_pt: Uma experiência incomum e emocionante.
example: Our trip to the jungle was a real adventure.

definition_en: Something bought at a good price; or to negotiate.
definition_pt: Algo comprado por um bom preço; ou negociar.
example: I found a real bargain at the shoe store today.

definition_en: To acknowledge an event with a social gathering.
definition_pt: Reconhecer um evento com uma reunião social.
example: We're going to celebrate her birthday with a party.

definition_en: Sweet food eaten after the main meal.
definition_pt: Comida doce consumida após a refeição principal.
example: I always save room for dessert when we eat out.

definition_en: A serious, unexpected situation requiring immediate action.
definition_pt: Uma situação séria e inesperada que requer ação imediata.
example: Call 911 in case of emergency.

definition_en: A person from another country.
definition_pt: Uma pessoa de outro país.
example: The foreigner asked for directions to the museum.

definition_en: A store that sells food and household items.
definition_pt: Uma loja que vende alimentos e artigos domésticos.
example: I need to stop by the grocery store to buy milk.

definition_en: To pause before saying or doing something.
definition_pt: Fazer uma pausa antes de dizer ou fazer algo.
example: Don't hesitate to ask if you need help.

definition_en: Red, painful skin caused by too much sun.
definition_pt: Pele vermelha e dolorida causada por excesso de sol.
example: I got sunburn at the beach yesterday.

definition_en: The loud noise that follows lightning.
definition_pt: O barulho alto que segue o relâmpago.
example: The thunder scared my dog during the storm.

definition_en: An object kept as a reminder of a place.
definition_pt: Um objeto guardado como recordação de um lugar.
example: I bought a keychain as a souvenir from Paris.

definition_en: A small flying insect that bites.
definition_pt: Um inseto voador pequeno que pica.
example: Use repellent to avoid mosquito bites.

definition_en: A device controlling water flow.
definition_pt: Dispositivo que controla o fluxo de água.
example: The faucet is leaking, we need to fix it.

definition_en: Any drinkable liquid.
definition_pt: Qualquer líquido que pode ser bebido.
example: Coffee is my favorite morning beverage.

definition_en: A path for pedestrians beside a road.
definition_pt: Um caminho para pedestres ao lado da rua.
example: Children are playing on the sidewalk.

definition_en: A piece of fabric worn around the neck.
definition_pt: Um pedaço de tecido usado ao redor do pescoço.
example: She wrapped a wool scarf around her neck.

definition_en: Light rain falling in fine drops.
definition_pt: Chuva leve caindo em gotas finas.
example: It's just drizzling, we don't need umbrellas.

definition_en: A kitchen appliance for mixing foods.
definition_pt: Eletrodoméstico para misturar alimentos.
example: I make smoothies with my blender every morning.

definition_en: An involuntary spasm of the diaphragm.
definition_pt: Um espasmo involuntário do diafragma.
example: Drink water slowly to stop hiccups.

definition_en: The daily appearance of the sun.
definition_pt: O aparecimento diário do sol.
example: We woke up early to watch the sunrise.

definition_en: The daily disappearance of the sun.
definition_pt: O desaparecimento diário do sol.
example: The sunset at the beach was beautiful.

definition_en: A portable battery-powered light.
definition_pt: Uma luz portátil movida a bateria.
example: We need a flashlight for camping at night.

definition_en: A lotion to protect skin from sun.
definition_pt: Loção para proteger a pele do sol.
example: Apply sunscreen before going to the beach.

definition_en: A hanging bed made of fabric or rope.
definition_pt: Uma cama suspensa feita de tecido ou corda.
example: I love relaxing in the hammock on weekends.

definition_en: Explosive devices for entertainment.
definition_pt: Dispositivos explosivos para entretenimento.
example: We watched fireworks on New Year's Eve.

definition_en: Needing or ready for sleep.
definition_pt: Precisando ou pronto para dormir.
example: I feel sleepy after a big meal.

definition_en: Needing or wanting to drink.
definition_pt: Precisando ou querendo beber.
example: The exercise made me very thirsty.

definition_en: Feeling that everything is spinning.
definition_pt: Sensação de que tudo está girando.
example: I felt dizzy after spinning in circles.

definition_en: An outdoor platform extending from a building.
definition_pt: Plataforma externa que se estende de um edifício.
example: We had coffee on the hotel balcony.

definition_en: A cushion for the head while sleeping.
definition_pt: Uma almofada para a cabeça ao dormir.
example: I need a softer pillow for my neck.

definition_en: A large piece of fabric for warmth.
definition_pt: Um grande pedaço de tecido para aquecimento.
example: It's cold tonight, I need an extra blanket.

definition_en: A recognizable natural or artificial feature.
definition_pt: Uma característica natural ou artificial reconhecível.
example: The Eiffel Tower is a famous Paris landmark.

definition_en: A person walking rather than traveling in a vehicle.
definition_pt: Pessoa caminhando em vez de viajar em veículo.
example: Pedestrians should use the crosswalk.

definition_en: A circular intersection where traffic moves around a center island.
definition_pt: Interseção circular onde o tráfego se move ao redor de uma ilha central.
example: Take the second exit at the roundabout.

definition_en: A temporary alternative route.
definition_pt: Uma rota alternativa temporária.
example: We had to take a detour because of road construction.

definition_en: Ice crystals forming on cold surfaces.
definition_pt: Cristais de gelo formando em superfícies frias.
example: There was frost on the car windows this morning.

definition_en: A small pool of liquid on the ground.
definition_pt: Uma pequena poça de líquido no chão.
example: Children love jumping in puddles after rain.

definition_en: Tiny drops of water on surfaces in the morning.
definition_pt: Pequenas gotas de água em superfícies pela manhã.
example: The grass was wet with dew at dawn.

definition_en: Thick cloud near the ground reducing visibility.
definition_pt: Nuvem espessa perto do solo reduzindo a visibilidade.
example: The airport delayed flights because of heavy fog.

definition_en: A gentle wind.
definition_pt: Um vento suave.
example: A cool breeze made the hot day pleasant.

definition_en: A long period with no rain.
definition_pt: Um longo período sem chuva.
example: The drought caused problems for farmers.

definition_en: An outdoor market selling secondhand goods.
definition_pt: Mercado ao ar livre que vende artigos usados.
example: I found vintage records at the flea market.

definition_en: Sale of used household goods from a home.
definition_pt: Venda de artigos domésticos usados em uma casa.
example: We're having a garage sale this Saturday.

definition_en: Money returned when payment exceeds the amount due.
definition_pt: Dinheiro devolvido quando o pagamento excede o valor devido.
example: The cashier gave me too much change by mistake.

definition_en: Full of people.
definition_pt: Cheio de pessoas.
example: The subway is always crowded during rush hour.

definition_en: Food with a strong hot flavor.
definition_pt: Comida com sabor forte e quente.
example: This curry is too spicy for me.

definition_en: Lacking strong flavor.
definition_pt: Faltando sabor forte.
example: The soup was too bland, so I added some salt.

definition_en: Uneaten food remaining after a meal.
definition_pt: Comida não consumida que resta após uma refeição.

definition_en: Prepared food bought to eat elsewhere.
definition_pt: Comida preparada comprada para comer em outro lugar.

definition_en: The desire to eat food.
definition_pt: O desejo de comer alimentos.
example: I have no appetite when I'm stressed.

definition_en: A place where bread and cakes are made/sold.
definition_pt: Um lugar onde pães e bolos são feitos/vendidos.

definition_en: A shop that sells meat.
definition_pt: Uma loja que vende carne.
example: The butcher recommended the best cut for our barbecue.

definition_en: Products made from milk.
definition_pt: Produtos feitos de leite.
example: Yogurt and cheese are dairy products.

definition_en: A shop selling fresh vegetables and fruit.
definition_pt: Uma loja que vende legumes e frutas frescas.

definition_en: Preserved by freezing.
definition_pt: Preservado pelo congelamento.

definition_en: Preserved in a sealed metal container.
definition_pt: Preservado em um recipiente de metal selado.
example: Canned beans are convenient for quick cooking.

definition_en: No longer usable or valid.
definition_pt: Não mais utilizável ou válido.
example: This milk is expired, we should throw it away.

definition_en: Providing nourishment; healthy to eat.
definition_pt: Fornecendo nutrição; saudável para comer.
example: Vegetables are very nutritious.

definition_en: Grown without artificial chemicals.
definition_pt: Cultivado sem produtos químicos artificiais.
example: We prefer organic fruits and vegetables.

definition_en: Fully developed and ready to eat.
definition_pt: Totalmente desenvolvido e pronto para comer.
example: Wait until the bananas are ripe before eating them.

definition_en: Not cooked.
definition_pt: Não cozido.
example: Sushi is made with raw fish.

definition_en: Easy to cut or chew; not tough.
definition_pt: Fácil de cortar ou mastigar; não duro.
example: The steak was very tender and delicious.

definition_en: Difficult to cut or chew.
definition_pt: Difícil de cortar ou mastigar.
example: This meat is too tough, I can't chew it.

definition_en: A discolored area on skin from injury.
definition_pt: Área descolorida na pele por lesão.
example: I got a bruise when I bumped into the table.

definition_en: A bubble of fluid under the skin.
definition_pt: Uma bolha de fluido sob a pele.

definition_en: A strip of material for covering wounds.
definition_pt: Uma tira de material para cobrir feridas.
example: Put a bandage on that cut to keep it clean.

definition_en: The act of traveling from one place to another.
definition_pt: O ato de viajar de um lugar para outro.

definition_en: Used to emphasize a fact or to correct someone.
definition_pt: Usado para enfatizar um fato ou corrigir alguém.
example: I thought he was French, but actually, he's from Belgium.

definition_en: Used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement seem surprising.
definition_pt: Usado para introduzir uma declaração que torna a declaração principal surpreendente.
example: Although it was raining, we went for a walk.

definition_en: To say that you are sorry for something you have done.
definition_pt: Dizer que você sente muito por algo que fez.
example: He apologized for being late.

definition_en: To recognize the value and significance of something; to be grateful for something.
definition_pt: Reconhecer o valor e a importância de algo; ser grato por algo.

definition_en: A way of thinking or feeling about something or someone.
definition_pt: Uma maneira de pensar ou sentir sobre algo ou alguém.
example: She has a very positive attitude towards work.

definition_en: Able to be used or obtained; free to meet or talk.
definition_pt: Que pode ser usado ou obtido; livre para se encontrar ou conversar.
example: Is this seat available?

definition_en: Having knowledge or perception of a situation or fact.
definition_pt: Ter conhecimento ou percepção de uma situação ou fato.
example: Are you aware of the problem?

definition_en: An advantage or profit gained from something.
definition_pt: Uma vantagem ou lucro obtido de algo.
example: One of the benefits of exercise is better health.

definition_en: The end or finish of an event, process, or text; a judgment or decision.
definition_pt: O fim ou término de um evento, processo ou texto; um julgamento ou decisão.
example: I came to the conclusion that he was right.

definition_en: Feeling or showing certainty about something.
definition_pt: Sentir ou mostrar certeza sobre algo.
example: She was confident that she would pass the exam.

definition_en: To think carefully about something.
definition_pt: Pensar cuidadosamente sobre algo.
example: We are considering moving to a new city.

definition_en: A conclusion or resolution reached after consideration.
definition_pt: Uma conclusão ou resolução alcançada após consideração.
example: Making a decision can be difficult.

definition_en: A change which is a result or consequence of an action or other cause.
definition_pt: Uma mudança que é resultado ou consequência de uma ação ou outra causa.
example: The medicine had a positive effect on the patient.

definition_en: Absolutely necessary; extremely important.
definition_pt: Absolutamente necessário; extremamente importante.
example: It is essential to drink water every day.

definition_en: In the end, especially after a long delay, dispute, or series of problems.
definition_pt: No final, especialmente após um longo atraso, disputa ou série de problemas.
example: After many attempts, she eventually succeeded.

definition_en: Not including; other than.
definition_pt: Não incluindo; além de.
example: Everyone was invited except for John.

definition_en: To regard something as likely to happen.
definition_pt: Considerar que algo é provável que aconteça.
example: We expect them to arrive around 6 PM.

definition_en: Well known from long or close association; recognized.
definition_pt: Bem conhecido por longa ou próxima associação; reconhecido.
example: That song sounds familiar.

definition_en: At, to, or by a greater distance or more advanced point.
definition_pt: A, para, ou por uma distância maior ou um ponto mais avançado.
example: We need to investigate this matter further.

definition_en: As an alternative or replacement.
definition_pt: Como uma alternativa ou substituição.
example: I don't have coffee, would you like tea instead?

definition_en: An important topic or problem for debate or discussion.
definition_pt: Um tópico ou problema importante para debate ou discussão.
example: The meeting was about environmental issues.

definition_en: To refer to something briefly and without going into detail.
definition_pt: Referir-se a algo brevemente e sem entrar em detalhes.

definition_en: A set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something.
definition_pt: Um conjunto de circunstâncias que torna possível fazer algo.
example: Going abroad is a great opportunity to learn a language.

definition_en: Used to single out an individual member of a specified group or class.
definition_pt: Usado para destacar um membro individual de um grupo ou classe especificado.
example: Is there a particular book you are looking for?

definition_en: Of or concerning the people as a whole.
definition_pt: De ou concernente ao povo como um todo.
example: The park is a public space.

definition_en: The reason for which something is done or created.
definition_pt: A razão pela qual algo é feito ou criado.
example: The purpose of this meeting is to plan the event.

definition_en: Having happened or been done not long ago.
definition_pt: Que aconteceu ou foi feito há pouco tempo.
example: In recent years, technology has advanced quickly.

definition_en: To identify someone or something seen before.
definition_pt: Identificar alguém ou algo visto antes.
example: I recognized her voice immediately on the phone.

definition_en: To need something or make something necessary.
definition_pt: Precisar de algo ou tornar algo necessário.
example: This job requires a lot of patience.

definition_en: A consequence, effect, or outcome of something.
definition_pt: Uma consequência, efeito ou resultado de algo.
example: The final result of the game was 2-1.

definition_en: Demanding or characterized by careful consideration; not joking.
definition_pt: Que exige ou é caracterizado por consideração cuidadosa; não está brincando.
example: This is a serious matter, we need to talk.

definition_en: To change something slightly to make it fit or work better.
definition_pt: Mudar algo ligeiramente para que se encaixe ou funcione melhor.
example: You need to adjust the settings on the TV.

definition_en: To confess to be true or to be the case.
definition_pt: Confessar que algo é verdadeiro ou é o caso.
example: He admitted that he had made a mistake.

definition_en: Clearly visible or understood; obvious.
definition_pt: Claramente visível ou entendido; óbvio.
example: For no apparent reason, she started laughing.

definition_en: To have a favorable opinion of something or someone.
definition_pt: Ter uma opinião favorável sobre algo ou alguém.
example: My parents don't approve of my new hairstyle.

definition_en: To connect someone or something in your mind with something else.
definition_pt: Conectar alguém ou algo em sua mente com outra coisa.
example: People often associate the color red with danger.

definition_en: To accept something as true without proof.
definition_pt: Aceitar algo como verdadeiro sem prova.
example: I assume you're here for the meeting.

definition_en: To make an effort to achieve or complete something difficult.
definition_pt: Fazer um esforço para alcançar ou completar algo difícil.
example: She attempted to break the world record.

definition_en: The mental and moral qualities of an individual; a person in a story.
definition_pt: As qualidades mentais e morais de um indivíduo; uma pessoa em uma história.
example: The main character in the book is a detective.

definition_en: To state that something is true without providing proof; to demand something you have a right to.
definition_pt: Afirmar que algo é verdadeiro sem fornecer prova; exigir algo a que se tem direito.
example: He claims to have seen a UFO.

definition_en: To focus all one's attention on a particular object or activity.
definition_pt: Focar toda a atenção em um objeto ou atividade específica.
example: It's hard to concentrate with all this noise.

definition_en: Anxiety or worry; a matter of interest or importance.
definition_pt: Ansiedade ou preocupação; uma questão de interesse ou importância.
example: My main concern is your health.

definition_en: To organize and carry out; a person's behavior.
definition_pt: Organizar e realizar; o comportamento de uma pessoa.
example: The scientist conducted a series of experiments.

definition_en: A result or effect of an action or condition.
definition_pt: Um resultado ou efeito de uma ação ou condição.
example: He didn't study and, as a consequence, he failed the exam.

definition_en: To use up a resource; to eat or drink.
definition_pt: Esgotar um recurso; comer ou beber.
example: The industry consumes vast amounts of energy.

definition_en: The state of touching or communicating with someone.
definition_pt: O estado de tocar ou se comunicar com alguém.
example: Please contact me by email.

definition_en: To cause someone to believe firmly in the truth of something.
definition_pt: Fazer alguém acreditar firmemente na verdade de algo.
example: She convinced me to go to the party.

definition_en: To organize the different parts of an activity so they work together.
definition_pt: Organizar as diferentes partes de uma atividade para que funcionem juntas.
example: We need someone to coordinate the project.

definition_en: To bring something into existence.
definition_pt: Trazer algo à existência.
example: The artist created a beautiful sculpture.

definition_en: Expressing adverse or disapproving comments; extremely important.
definition_pt: Expressar comentários adversos ou de desaprovação; extremamente importante.
example: Your help is critical for the success of this mission.

definition_en: The ideas, customs, and social behavior of a particular people or society.
definition_pt: As ideias, costumes e comportamento social de um povo ou sociedade em particular.
example: I love learning about Japanese culture.

definition_en: A formal discussion on a particular topic; to discuss a topic formally.
definition_pt: Uma discussão formal sobre um tópico específico; discutir um tópico formalmente.
example: The students debated the issue of climate change.

definition_en: A period of ten years.
definition_pt: Um período de dez anos.
example: Technology has changed a lot in the past decade.

definition_en: To politely refuse; a gradual and continuous loss of strength or quality.
definition_pt: Recusar educadamente; uma perda gradual e contínua de força ou qualidade.
example: She declined the job offer. / There's been a decline in sales.

definition_en: To state or describe the exact nature or meaning of something.
definition_pt: Declarar ou descrever a natureza exata ou o significado de algo.
example: Can you define the word 'metaphor' for me?

definition_en: To show clearly by giving proof or evidence.
definition_pt: Mostrar claramente dando prova ou evidência.
example: The experiment demonstrated that the theory was correct.

definition_en: To state that something is not true; to refuse to give something.
definition_pt: Declarar que algo não é verdadeiro; recusar-se a dar algo.
example: The company denied any involvement in the scandal.

definition_en: To put money into a bank account; a sum of money paid as a first installment.
definition_pt: Colocar dinheiro em uma conta bancária; uma quantia paga como primeira parcela.
example: I need to deposit this check. / We paid a deposit on the apartment.

definition_en: To obtain something from a specified source.
definition_pt: Obter algo de uma fonte específica.
example: The word is derived from Latin.

definition_en: To give a detailed account in words of.
definition_pt: Dar um relato detalhado em palavras.
example: Can you describe the man you saw?

definition_en: To plan and make decisions about how something will be made; a plan or drawing.
definition_pt: Planejar e tomar decisões sobre como algo será feito; um plano ou desenho.
example: She designs websites for a living.

definition_en: A strong feeling of wanting to have something or wishing for something to happen.
definition_pt: Um forte sentimento de querer ter algo ou desejar que algo aconteça.
example: He has a strong desire to travel the world.

definition_en: To put an end to the existence of something by damaging or attacking it.
definition_pt: Colocar um fim na existência de algo danificando-o ou atacando-o.
example: The fire destroyed the entire building.

definition_en: To cause something to occur in a particular way; to ascertain.
definition_pt: Fazer com que algo ocorra de uma maneira particular; averiguar.
example: Your performance will determine your final grade.

definition_en: To give shares of something; to deal out.
definition_pt: Dar partes de algo; entregar.
example: Volunteers will distribute food to the homeless.

definition_en: To give special importance or prominence to something in speaking or writing.
definition_pt: Dar importância ou destaque especial a algo ao falar ou escrever.
example: I want to emphasize the importance of being on time.

definition_en: To give someone the authority or means to do something.
definition_pt: Dar a alguém a autoridade ou meios para fazer algo.
example: This software enables users to edit videos easily.

definition_en: To occupy or attract someone's interest or attention.
definition_pt: Ocupar ou atrair o interesse ou a atenção de alguém.
example: The teacher tried to engage the shy student in conversation.

definition_en: To set up on a firm or permanent basis.
definition_pt: Configurar em uma base firme ou permanente.
example: The company was established in 1995.

definition_en: To roughly calculate or judge the value, number, quantity, or extent of.
definition_pt: Calcular ou julgar aproximadamente o valor, número, quantidade ou extensão de.
example: Can you estimate how long the repair will take?

definition_en: To form an idea of the amount, number, or value of; to assess.
definition_pt: Formar uma ideia da quantidade, número ou valor de; avaliar.
example: The manager will evaluate your performance after three months.

definition_en: To deny someone access to a place, group, or privilege.
definition_pt: Negar a alguém o acesso a um lugar, grupo ou privilégio.
example: The price excludes taxes and shipping.

definition_en: To become or make larger or more extensive.
definition_pt: Tornar-se ou fazer maior ou mais extenso.
example: The company plans to expand into new markets.

definition_en: A person who has a comprehensive and authoritative knowledge of a skill.
definition_pt: Uma pessoa que tem um conhecimento abrangente e autoritativo de uma habilidade.
example: She is an expert in ancient history.

definition_en: A circumstance, fact, or influence that contributes to a result.
definition_pt: Uma circunstância, fato ou influência que contribui para um resultado.
example: Cost was the main factor in our decision.

definition_en: A distinctive attribute or aspect; a special article in a newspaper or magazine.
definition_pt: Um atributo ou aspecto distintivo; um artigo especial em um jornal ou revista.
example: The new phone has some interesting features.

definition_en: The center of interest or activity; to concentrate.
definition_pt: O centro de interesse ou atividade; concentrar.
example: You need to focus on your studies.

definition_en: An activity or purpose natural to a person or thing; to work or operate.
definition_pt: Uma atividade ou propósito natural para uma pessoa ou coisa; trabalhar ou operar.
example: The function of the heart is to pump blood. / The machine isn't functioning properly.

definition_en: To provide money for a project; a sum of money saved or made available for a purpose.
definition_pt: Fornecer dinheiro para um projeto; uma soma de dinheiro guardada ou disponibilizada para um propósito.
example: The project is funded by the government.

definition_en: The action of one object coming forcibly into contact with another; a marked effect.
definition_pt: A ação de um objeto entrar forçosamente em contato com outro; um efeito marcante.
example: The new law had a significant impact on pollution levels.

definition_en: To point out; to show.
definition_pt: Apontar; mostrar.
example: The sign indicates the way to the exit.

definition_en: Certain to happen; unavoidable.
definition_pt: Certo de acontecer; inevitável.
example: It was inevitable that they would find out the truth.

definition_en: To expend money with the expectation of achieving a profit or material result.
definition_pt: Gastar dinheiro com a expectativa de obter lucro ou resultado material.
example: It's a good time to invest in the stock market.

definition_en: To include something as a necessary part or result.
definition_pt: Incluir algo como uma parte ou resultado necessário.
example: The job involves a lot of travel.

definition_en: An individual article or unit, especially one that is part of a list or collection.
definition_pt: Um artigo ou unidade individual, especialmente um que faz parte de uma lista ou coleção.
example: The next item on the agenda is the budget.

definition_en: To cause something to continue; to keep in existence.
definition_pt: Fazer com que algo continue; manter em existência.
example: It's important to maintain a healthy diet.

definition_en: Important, serious, or significant.
definition_pt: Importante, sério ou significativo.
example: There has been a major change in plans.

definition_en: A particular procedure for accomplishing or approaching something.
definition_pt: Um procedimento particular para realizar ou abordar algo.
example: What's the best method for learning vocabulary?

definition_en: A thing aimed at or sought; a goal.
definition_pt: Uma coisa visada ou procurada; um objetivo.
example: Our main objective is to increase sales.

definition_en: Easily perceived or understood; clear.
definition_pt: Facilmente percebido ou entendido; claro.
example: It was obvious that he was lying.

definition_en: To happen; to take place.
definition_pt: Acontecer; ter lugar.
example: The accident occurred at midnight.

definition_en: A thing that is or may be chosen.
definition_pt: Uma coisa que é ou pode ser escolhida.
example: We have several options for dinner.

definition_en: To take part in an activity or event.
definition_pt: Tomar parte em uma atividade ou evento.
example: All students are encouraged to participate in the discussion.

definition_en: To become aware or conscious of something; to interpret or regard in a particular way.
definition_pt: Tornar-se consciente de algo; interpretar ou considerar de uma maneira particular.
example: How is this policy perceived by the public?

definition_en: Consisting in or characterized by the presence of good qualities; hopeful.
definition_pt: Consistindo em ou caracterizado pela presença de qualidades boas; esperançoso.
example: Try to stay positive, things will get better.

definition_en: Having or showing the capacity to develop into something in the future.
definition_pt: Ter ou mostrar a capacidade de se desenvolver em algo no futuro.
example: She has the potential to be a great leader.

definition_en: To say that an event or action will happen in the future.
definition_pt: Dizer que um evento ou ação acontecerá no futuro.
example: It's difficult to predict the weather.

definition_en: Existing or occurring before in time or order.
definition_pt: Existir ou ocorrer antes no tempo ou ordem.
example: On a previous visit, I met her brother.

definition_en: Of chief importance; principal.
definition_pt: De importância principal.
example: Our primary concern is safety.

definition_en: To acquire something by paying for it; the action of buying something.
definition_pt: Adquirir algo pagando por isso; a ação de comprar algo.
example: You can purchase tickets online.

definition_en: A variety of things of a particular type; the area of variation between limits.
definition_pt: Uma variedade de coisas de um tipo particular; a área de variação entre limites.
example: The store sells a wide range of products.

definition_en: To respond or behave in a particular way in response to something.
definition_pt: Responder ou comportar-se de uma maneira particular em resposta a algo.
example: How did he react when you told him the news?

definition_en: To enter or record on an official list or directory.
definition_pt: Inserir ou gravar em uma lista ou diretório oficial.
example: You need to register for the course by Friday.

definition_en: To control or maintain the rate or speed of something.
definition_pt: Controlar ou manter a taxa ou velocidade de algo.
example: This valve regulates the flow of water.

definition_en: Closely connected or appropriate to the matter at hand.
definition_pt: Estritamente conectado ou apropriado para o assunto em questão.
example: Please keep your comments relevant to the topic.

definition_en: To take away or eliminate from a place.
definition_pt: Tirar ou eliminar de um lugar.
example: Please remove your shoes before entering.

definition_en: To take the place of something or someone.
definition_pt: Tomar o lugar de algo ou alguém.
example: We need to replace the broken window.

definition_en: To find a solution to a problem or dispute.
definition_pt: Encontrar uma solução para um problema ou disputa.
example: The couple resolved their argument.

definition_en: A stock or supply of materials or assets that can be drawn on.
definition_pt: Um estoque ou suprimento de materiais ou ativos que podem ser usados.
example: The country is rich in natural resources like oil and gas.

definition_en: To say or do something as a reaction to something.
definition_pt: Dizer ou fazer algo como reação a algo.
example: She didn't respond to my question.

definition_en: To bring back a previous condition or situation.
definition_pt: Trazer de volta uma condição ou situação anterior.
example: They plan to restore the old castle.

definition_en: To put a limit on; to keep under control.
definition_pt: Colocar um limite em; manter sob controle.
example: Access to the file is restricted to managers only.

definition_en: To continue to have something; to keep possession of.
definition_pt: Continuar a ter algo; manter a posse de.
example: The soil retains water well.

definition_en: To make previously unknown or secret information known.
definition_pt: Tornar conhecida uma informação previamente desconhecida ou secreta.
example: The document revealed the truth about the incident.

definition_en: To attempt to find or obtain something.
definition_pt: Tentar encontrar ou obter algo.
example: They are seeking new opportunities in Europe.

definition_en: To carefully choose as being the best or most suitable.
definition_pt: Escolher cuidadosamente por ser o melhor ou mais adequado.
example: Please select your preferred language.

definition_en: An area of ground on which something is located; a website.
definition_pt: Uma área de terreno onde algo está localizado; um website.
example: This is the site of the ancient battle. / I found the information on their site.

definition_en: A plan of action designed to achieve a long-term or overall aim.
definition_pt: Um plano de ação projetado para alcançar um objetivo de longo prazo ou geral.
example: We need a new marketing strategy.

definition_en: To present for consideration or judgment; to yield to authority.
definition_pt: Apresentar para consideração ou julgamento; ceder à autoridade.
example: You must submit your application by the deadline.

definition_en: Coming after something in time; following.
definition_pt: Vindo depois de algo no tempo; seguinte.
example: Subsequent events proved that he was right.

definition_en: To use something instead of another thing; a person or thing acting in place of another.
definition_pt: Usar algo em vez de outra coisa; uma pessoa ou coisa que age no lugar de outra.
example: You can substitute honey for sugar in this recipe.

definition_en: A brief statement or account of the main points of something.
definition_pt: Uma breve declaração ou relato dos pontos principais de algo.
example: He gave a summary of the main points.

definition_en: To look carefully and thoroughly at; a set of questions asked of many people.
definition_pt: Olhar cuidadosa e minuciosamente para; um conjunto de perguntas feitas a muitas pessoas.
example: We surveyed 500 people for our research.

definition_en: To continue to live or exist, especially in spite of danger or hardship.
definition_pt: Continuar a viver ou existir, especialmente apesar do perigo ou dificuldade.
example: Few plants can survive in the desert.

definition_en: A thing that represents or stands for something else.
definition_pt: Uma coisa que representa ou significa algo else.
example: The dove is a symbol of peace.

definition_en: An objective or result towards which efforts are directed.
definition_pt: Um objetivo ou resultado para o qual os esforços são direcionados.
example: Our target is to raise $10,000.

definition_en: A piece of work to be done or undertaken.
definition_pt: Um pedaço de trabalho a ser feito ou empreendido.
example: My first task is to write the report.

definition_en: A way of carrying out a particular task, especially the execution of an artistic work.
definition_pt: Uma maneira de realizar uma tarefa particular, especialmente a execução de um trabalho artístico.
example: She has developed a new technique for painting.

definition_en: The application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes.
definition_pt: A aplicação do conhecimento científico para fins práticos.
example: Modern technology has changed how we communicate.

definition_en: Lasting for only a limited period of time; not permanent.
definition_pt: Durando apenas por um período limitado de tempo; não permanente.
example: This is just a temporary solution.

definition_en: A supposition or a system of ideas intended to explain something.
definition_pt: Uma suposição ou um sistema de ideias destinado a explicar algo.
example: Einstein's theory of relativity.

definition_en: To move from one place to another.
definition_pt: Mover de um lugar para outro.
example: I need to transfer money to my savings account.

definition_en: To make a thorough or dramatic change in the form, appearance, or character of.
definition_pt: Fazer uma mudança completa ou dramática na forma, aparência ou caráter de.
example: They transformed the old warehouse into apartments.

definition_en: To take or carry people or goods from one place to another; the system of doing this.
definition_pt: Levar ou carregar pessoas ou mercadorias de um lugar para outro; o sistema de fazer isso.
example: The goods will be transported by truck.

definition_en: A general direction in which something is developing or changing.
definition_pt: Uma direção geral na qual algo está se desenvolvendo ou mudando.
example: The current trend is towards healthier eating.

definition_en: Being or happening at the end of a process; final.
definition_pt: Ser ou acontecer no final de um processo; final.
example: The ultimate goal is world peace.

definition_en: Being the only one of its kind; unlike anything else.
definition_pt: Ser o único do seu tipo; diferente de qualquer outra coisa.
example: Everyone's fingerprints are unique.

definition_en: To make practical and effective use of something.
definition_pt: Fazer uso prático e eficaz de algo.
example: We can utilize this space for storage.

definition_en: Having a sound basis in logic or fact; reasonable.
definition_pt: Ter uma base sólida em lógica ou fato; razoável.
example: You need a valid passport to travel internationally.

definition_en: To differ in size, amount, degree, or nature from something else.
definition_pt: Diferir em tamanho, quantidade, grau ou natureza de algo else.
example: Prices vary depending on the season.

definition_en: A particular form of something differing in certain respects from an earlier form.
definition_pt: Uma forma particular de algo que difere em certos aspectos de uma forma anterior.
example: This is the latest version of the software.

definition_en: The amount of space that a substance or object occupies; a book.
definition_pt: A quantidade de espaço que uma substância ou objeto ocupa; um livro.
example: Turn down the volume, it's too loud.

definition_en: The health, happiness, and fortunes of a person or group.
definition_pt: A saúde, felicidade e fortunas de uma pessoa ou grupo.
example: We are concerned about the welfare of the animals.

definition_en: Used to contrast two facts or situations.
definition_pt: Usado para contrastar dois fatos ou situações.
example: She loves classical music, whereas I prefer rock.

definition_en: Found or distributed over a large area or number of people.
definition_pt: Encontrado ou distribuído por uma área grande ou número de pessoas.
example: There is widespread support for the new policy.

definition_en: Resembling without being identical.
definition_pt: Que se assemelha sem ser idêntico.
example: Our opinions on this are very similar.

definition_en: A set of circumstances in which one finds oneself.
definition_pt: Um conjunto de circunstâncias em que alguém se encontra.
example: We found ourselves in a difficult situation.

definition_en: The ability to do something well.
definition_pt: A capacidade de fazer algo bem.
example: Cooking is a useful skill to have.

definition_en: To bear all or part of the weight; to give assistance or encouragement.
definition_pt: Suportar todo ou parte do peso; dar assistência ou encorajamento.
example: I will always support your decisions.

definition_en: Different from one another; of different kinds.
definition_pt: Diferentes um do outro; de tipos diferentes.
example: We discussed various topics during the meeting.

definition_en: A difficult task or problem that tests ability or determination.
definition_pt: Uma tarefa ou problema difícil que testa a habilidade ou determinação.
example: Climbing the mountain was a real challenge.

definition_en: To successfully reach a goal or result by effort.
definition_pt: Alcançar um objetivo ou resultado com esforço.
example: She worked hard to achieve her dreams.

definition_en: An opinion or suggestion about what someone should do.
definition_pt: Opinião ou sugestão sobre o que alguém deve fazer.
example: My teacher gave me good advice.

definition_en: To keep away from or stop oneself from doing something.
definition_pt: Manter distância ou impedir-se de fazer algo.
example: He tries to avoid eating too much sugar.

definition_en: To act in a particular way, especially politely.
definition_pt: Agir de determinada maneira, especialmente educadamente.
example: Children should behave in class.

definition_en: To need someone or something for support or help.
definition_pt: Precisar de alguém ou algo para apoio ou ajuda.
example: Children depend on their parents.

definition_en: To grow or cause something to grow and become more advanced.
definition_pt: Crescer ou fazer algo crescer e se tornar mais avançado.
example: He wants to develop his English skills.

definition_en: To give support, confidence, or hope to someone.
definition_pt: Dar apoio, confiança ou esperança a alguém.
example: Teachers encourage students to ask questions.

definition_en: The natural world, or conditions in which people live.
definition_pt: O mundo natural ou as condições em que as pessoas vivem.
example: We must protect the environment.

definition_en: Practical contact with and observation of facts or events.
definition_pt: Contato prático e observação de fatos ou eventos.
example: She has a lot of work experience.

definition_en: To make or become better.
definition_pt: Tornar-se ou fazer algo melhor.
example: He wants to improve his writing skills.

definition_en: Information, understanding, or skill gained through learning.
definition_pt: Informação, compreensão ou habilidade adquirida através do aprendizado.
example: He has a good knowledge of history.

definition_en: Unwilling to work or use energy.
definition_pt: Que não quer trabalhar ou gastar energia.
example: He is too lazy to clean his room.

definition_en: To present or give something to someone.
definition_pt: Apresentar ou dar algo a alguém.
example: She offered me a cup of tea.

definition_en: Used to express possibility or uncertainty.
definition_pt: Usado para expressar possibilidade ou incerteza.
example: Perhaps we will go to the park later.

definition_en: To tell someone you will definitely do or not do something.
definition_pt: Dizer a alguém que você certamente fará ou não fará algo.
example: He promised to help me with my homework.

definition_en: Right or appropriate for a particular purpose.
definition_pt: Correto ou apropriado para um propósito específico.
example: This dress is suitable for the party.

definition_en: To buy or obtain for oneself; to learn or develop a skill, quality, etc.
definition_pt: Comprar ou obter para si; aprender ou desenvolver uma habilidade, qualidade, etc.
example: The company acquired its main competitor last year.

definition_en: Next to or adjoining something else.
definition_pt: Próximo ou contíguo a algo else.
example: Our hotel room was adjacent to the elevator shaft.

definition_en: Although (used to introduce a fact or comment that reduces the force of what was said before).
definition_pt: Embora (usado para introduzir um fato ou comentário que reduz a força do que foi dito antes).
example: The mission was successful, albeit with some difficulties.

definition_en: To place or arrange things in a straight line; to bring into cooperation or agreement.
definition_pt: Colocar ou organizar coisas em linha reta; trazer para cooperação ou acordo.
example: Our goals need to align with the company's vision.

definition_en: A claim or assertion that someone has done something illegal or wrong, typically without proof.
definition_pt: Uma alegação ou afirmação de que alguém fez algo ilegal ou errado, normalmente sem prova.
example: He denied the allegations of corruption.

definition_en: To make minor changes to a text, law, or contract to improve it or make it more accurate.
definition_pt: Fazer pequenas alterações em um texto, lei ou contrato para melhorá-lo ou torná-lo mais preciso.
example: The constitution was amended to guarantee this right.

definition_en: A comparison between one thing and another, typically for the purpose of explanation or clarification.
definition_pt: Uma comparação entre uma coisa e outra, normalmente para fins de explicação ou esclarecimento.
example: He used an analogy between the immune system and an army to explain it.

definition_en: Once a year; every year.
definition_pt: Uma vez por ano; todos os anos.
example: The festival is held annually in July.

definition_en: To regard as probable; to expect or predict.
definition_pt: Considerar como provável; esperar ou prever.
example: We anticipate a large crowd at the event.

definition_en: The technical equipment or machinery needed for a particular activity or purpose.
definition_pt: O equipamento técnico ou maquinário necessário para uma atividade ou propósito específico.
example: The firemen used specialized apparatus to cut through the wreckage.

definition_en: Based on random choice or personal whim, rather than any reason or system.
definition_pt: Baseado em escolha aleatória ou capricho pessoal, em vez de qualquer razão ou sistema.
example: The rules seemed completely arbitrary to the new players.

definition_en: To express an idea or feeling fluently and coherently; having the ability to do this.
definition_pt: Expressar uma ideia ou sentimento de forma fluente e coerente; ter a capacidade de fazê-lo.
example: She was able to articulate her concerns very clearly.

definition_en: To state a fact or belief confidently and forcefully.
definition_pt: Declarar um fato ou crença com confiança e força.
example: He asserted his innocence throughout the trial.

definition_en: To evaluate or estimate the nature, ability, or quality of something.
definition_pt: Avaliar ou estimar a natureza, habilidade ou qualidade de algo.
example: We need to assess the damage caused by the storm.

definition_en: Inclination or prejudice for or against one person or group, especially in a way considered to be unfair.
definition_pt: Inclinação ou preconceito a favor ou contra uma pessoa ou grupo, especialmente de uma forma considerada injusta.
example: The newspaper was accused of political bias in its reporting.

definition_en: A connection between people or groups; a force holding atoms together.
definition_pt: Uma conexão entre pessoas ou grupos; uma força que mantém os átomos unidos.
example: There is a strong bond between the twins.

definition_en: Having the ability, fitness, or quality necessary to do or achieve a specified thing.
definition_pt: Ter a habilidade, aptidão ou qualidade necessária para fazer ou alcançar algo específico.
example: She is perfectly capable of managing the team herself.

definition_en: The maximum amount that something can contain; the ability or power to do something.
definition_pt: A quantidade máxima que algo pode conter; a habilidade ou poder de fazer algo.
example: The stadium has a capacity of 80,000 people.

definition_en: To throw something forcefully; the actors in a play, film, or show.
definition_pt: Lançar algo com força; os atores de uma peça, filme ou show.
example: He cast his fishing line into the river. / The film has an all-star cast.

definition_en: A written grant of rights or privileges by a government; to hire an aircraft, boat, etc.
definition_pt: Uma concessão por escrito de direitos ou privilégios por um governo; alugar uma aeronave, barco, etc.
example: The Royal Charter was granted in the 17th century. / They chartered a yacht for the week.

definition_en: A particular and separate article, stipulation, or proviso in a treaty, bill, or contract.
definition_pt: Um artigo, estipulação ou condição particular e separada em um tratado, projeto de lei ou contrato.
example: There's a clause in my contract about overtime.

definition_en: Logical and consistent; forming a unified whole.
definition_pt: Lógico e consistente; formando um todo unificado.
example: She presented a coherent argument for her proposal.

definition_en: To occur at the same time; to be in agreement.
definition_pt: Ocorrer ao mesmo tempo; estar em acordo.
example: Our views on this matter coincide perfectly.

definition_en: To fall down or give way suddenly; to fail suddenly and completely.
definition_pt: Cair ou ceder subitamente; falhar de repente e completamente.
example: The old bridge collapsed under the weight of the truck.

definition_en: To hit with force when moving.
definition_pt: Bater com força enquanto em movimento.
example: Two trains collided head-on, causing a major disaster.

definition_en: To begin; to start.
definition_pt: Começar; iniciar.
example: The ceremony will commence at noon.

definition_en: To give someone something, typically money, in recognition of loss, suffering, or injury.
definition_pt: Dar algo a alguém, normalmente dinheiro, em reconhecimento de perda, sofrimento ou lesão.
example: The company compensated him for his injuries.

definition_en: To produce something, especially a list, report, or book, by assembling information collected from other sources.
definition_pt: Produzir algo, especialmente uma lista, relatório ou livro, reunindo informações coletadas de outras fontes.
example: We need to compile a list of all the attendees.

definition_en: A thing that completes or brings to perfection; to add to something in a way that enhances or improves it.
definition_pt: Uma coisa que completa ou traz à perfeição; adicionar a algo de uma forma que melhora ou aperfeiçoa.
example: The wine complements the cheese perfectly.

definition_en: To form or devise a plan or idea in the mind; to become pregnant.
definition_pt: Formar ou idealizar um plano ou ideia na mente; engravidar.
example: He conceived the plot for his novel while traveling.

definition_en: Existing, happening, or done at the same time.
definition_pt: Existir, acontecer ou ser feito ao mesmo tempo.
example: She was serving two concurrent prison sentences.

definition_en: To have discussions; to exchange opinions; to give an official title or honor to someone.
definition_pt: Ter discussões; trocar opiniões; dar um título ou honra oficial a alguém.
example: He needed to confer with his colleagues before making a decision.

definition_en: To keep or restrict someone or something within certain limits.
definition_pt: Manter ou restringir alguém ou algo dentro de certos limites.
example: Please confine your remarks to the topic at hand.

definition_en: A general agreement among a group of people.
definition_pt: Um acordo geral entre um grupo de pessoas.
example: We need to reach a consensus on this issue.

definition_en: To be a part of a whole; to amount to.
definition_pt: Ser uma parte de um todo; equivaler a.
example: Women constitute a large part of the workforce.

definition_en: To deny the truth of a statement by asserting the opposite.
definition_pt: Negar a verdade de uma declaração afirmando o oposto.
example: The new evidence contradicts his earlier testimony.

definition_en: Prolonged public disagreement or heated discussion.
definition_pt: Desacordo público prolongado ou discussão acalorada.
example: The new law is the subject of much controversy.

definition_en: To come or bring together for a meeting or activity; to assemble.
definition_pt: Vir ou reunir-se para uma reunião ou atividade; assemblar.
example: The committee will convene next Thursday.

definition_en: To engage in conversation.
definition_pt: Participar de uma conversa.
example: They were conversing quietly in the corner.

definition_en: To change the form, character, or function of something.
definition_pt: Mudar a forma, caráter ou função de algo.
example: They converted the attic into a bedroom.

definition_en: To transport or carry to a place; to communicate a message or information.
definition_pt: Transportar ou levar para um lugar; comunicar uma mensagem ou informação.
example: Please convey my apologies to your wife.

definition_en: A firmly held belief or opinion; the formal declaration that someone is guilty of a criminal offense.
definition_pt: Uma crença ou opinião firmemente mantida; a declaração formal de que alguém é culpado de um crime.
example: She spoke with great conviction about human rights.

definition_en: To work jointly towards the same end.
definition_pt: Trabalhar em conjunto para o mesmo fim.
example: The two companies agreed to cooperate on the project.

definition_en: The central or most important part of something.
definition_pt: A parte central ou mais importante de algo.
example: This issue is at the core of the debate.

definition_en: To have a close similarity, match, or agreement; to communicate by exchanging letters.
definition_pt: Ter uma estreita semelhança, correspondência ou acordo; comunicar-se trocando cartas.
example: The description corresponds to that of the missing person.

definition_en: Decisive or critical, especially in the success or failure of something.
definition_pt: Decisivo ou crítico, especialmente no sucesso ou fracasso de algo.
example: Timing is crucial for this plan to work.

definition_en: A system of money in general use in a particular country; the fact or quality of being generally accepted or in use.
definition_pt: Um sistema de dinheiro em uso geral em um país específico; o fato ou qualidade de ser geralmente aceito ou em uso.
example: The country is considering adopting a new currency.

definition_en: To regard or consider in a specified way.
definition_pt: Considerar ou julgar de uma maneira específica.
example: The event was deemed a great success.

definition_en: To entrust a task or responsibility to another person; a person sent to represent others.
definition_pt: Confi ar uma tarefa ou responsabilidade a outra pessoa; uma pessoa enviada para representar outras.
example: A good manager knows how to delegate effectively.

definition_en: Done consciously and intentionally; to engage in long and careful consideration.
definition_pt: Feito consciente e intencionalmente; envolver-se em consideração longa e cuidadosa.
example: This was a deliberate attempt to mislead the public.

definition_en: Outward behavior or bearing.
definition_pt: Comportamento ou postura exterior.
example: His calm demeanor helped soothe the frightened child.

definition_en: To be a sign of; to indicate.
definition_pt: Ser um sinal de; indicar.
example: The red flag denotes danger.

definition_en: To represent by a drawing, painting, or other art form; to describe in words.
definition_pt: Representar por um desenho, pintura ou outra forma de arte; descrever em palavras.
example: The mural depicts scenes from the country's history.

definition_en: A thing made or adapted for a particular purpose, especially a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment.
definition_pt: Uma coisa feita ou adaptada para um propósito específico, especialmente uma peça de equipamento mecânico ou eletrônico.
example: This is a clever device for opening bottles.

definition_en: To plan or invent a complex procedure, system, or mechanism by careful thought.
definition_pt: Planejar ou inventar um procedimento, sistema ou mecanismo complexo por meio de pensamento cuidadoso.
example: They devised a plan to escape.

definition_en: To recognize or ascertain what makes someone or something different; to make become different.
definition_pt: Reconhecer ou ascertain o que torna alguém ou algo diferente; fazer com que se torne diferente.
example: It's important to differentiate between fact and opinion.

definition_en: To spread over a wide area; not concentrated.
definition_pt: Espalhar-se por uma área ampla; não concentrado.
example: The light was diffused by the frosted glass.

definition_en: A measurable extent of a particular kind, such as length, breadth, depth, or height; an aspect or feature.
definition_pt: Uma extensão mensurável de um tipo particular, como comprimento, largura, profundidade ou altura; um aspecto ou característica.
example: We need to consider the social dimension of this problem.

definition_en: To make or become less.
definition_pt: Tornar-se ou fazer menos.
example: The sound diminished as the car drove away.

definition_en: Individually separate and distinct.
definition_pt: Individualmente separado e distinto.
example: The change happened in three discrete stages.

definition_en: To distribute or spread over a wide area; to cause to vanish.
definition_pt: Distribuir ou espalhar por uma área ampla; fazer desaparecer.
example: The police dispersed the crowd.

definition_en: To get rid of by throwing away or giving or selling to someone else; to incline someone towards a particular attitude.
definition_pt: Livrear-se de algo jogando fora ou dando ou vendendo para outra pessoa; inclinar alguém a uma atitude particular.
example: How should we dispose of this waste? / I'm not disposed to argue.

definition_en: A disagreement or argument; to argue about something.
definition_pt: Um desacordo ou argumento; discutir sobre algo.
example: The dispute over the border lasted for decades.

definition_en: To pull or twist out of shape; to give a misleading or false account of.
definition_pt: Puxar ou torcer para fora do formato; dar um relato enganoso ou falso de.
example: The media distorted his comments.

definition_en: Showing a great deal of variety; very different.
definition_pt: Mostrando uma grande variedade; muito diferente.
example: The city has a culturally diverse population.

definition_en: An area of territory owned or controlled by a ruler or government; a field of activity or knowledge.
definition_pt: Uma área de território pertencente ou controlada por um governante ou governo; um campo de atividade ou conhecimento.
example: This problem lies outside my domain of expertise.

definition_en: To have a commanding influence on; to exercise control over.
definition_pt: Ter uma influência dominante sobre; exercer controle sobre.
example: The castle dominates the skyline.

definition_en: A preliminary version of a piece of writing; to select for a duty.
definition_pt: Uma versão preliminar de um texto; selecionar para um dever.
example: This is just a first draft of my speech.

definition_en: A play for theater, radio, or television; an exciting, emotional, or unexpected event or circumstance.
definition_pt: Uma peça para teatro, rádio ou televisão; um evento ou circunstância emocionante, emocional ou inesperada.
example: There's always so much drama in her life.

definition_en: The time during which something continues.
definition_pt: O tempo durante o qual algo continua.
example: The course is of six months' duration.

definition_en: Characterized by constant change, activity, or progress; a force that stimulates change or progress.
definition_pt: Caracterizado por mudança, atividade ou progresso constantes; uma força que estimula mudança ou progresso.
example: The dynamic between the two leaders was fascinating to watch.

definition_en: The branch of biology that deals with the relations of organisms to one another and to their physical surroundings.
definition_pt: O ramo da biologia que trata das relações dos organismos entre si e com seu ambiente físico.
example: She studied marine ecology at university.

definition_en: To prepare written material for publication by correcting, condensing, or otherwise modifying it.
definition_pt: Preparar material escrito para publicação corrigindo, condensando ou modificando-o de outra forma.
example: I need to edit this article before it goes to print.

definition_en: An essential or characteristic part of something abstract; each of more than one hundred substances that cannot be chemically broken down.
definition_pt: Uma parte essencial ou característica de algo abstrato; cada uma das mais de cem substâncias que não podem ser quimicamente decompostas.
example: Dramatic irony is a key element of tragedy.

definition_en: To completely remove or get rid of something.
definition_pt: Remover completamente ou livrar-se de algo.
example: The new policy aims to eliminate discrimination.

definition_en: Based on, concerned with, or verifiable by observation or experience rather than theory or pure logic.
definition_pt: Baseado em, preocupado com, ou verificável por observação ou experiência, em vez de teoria ou lógica pura.
example: We need empirical evidence to support this claim.

definition_en: To compel observance of or compliance with a law, rule, or obligation.
definition_pt: Obrigar o cumprimento ou conformidade com uma lei, regra ou obrigação.
example: It's difficult to enforce the new regulations.

definition_en: To intensify, increase, or further improve the quality, value, or extent of.
definition_pt: Intensificar, aumentar ou melhorar ainda mais a qualidade, valor ou extensão de.
example: The spices enhanced the flavor of the dish.

definition_en: A thing with distinct and independent existence.
definition_pt: Uma coisa com existência distinta e independente.
example: The hospital is operated as a separate legal entity.

definition_en: To consider one thing as being the same as or equivalent to another.
definition_pt: Considerar uma coisa como sendo a mesma ou equivalente a outra.
example: You can't equate wealth with happiness.

definition_en: To supply with the necessary items for a particular purpose.
definition_pt: Fornecer os itens necessários para um propósito específico.
example: The laboratory is equipped with the latest technology.

definition_en: Equal in value, amount, function, meaning, etc.
definition_pt: Igual em valor, quantidade, função, significado, etc.
example: What is the equivalent amount in euros?

definition_en: To gradually wear away soil, rock, or land; to gradually destroy or be gradually destroyed.
definition_pt: Desgastar gradualmente o solo, a rocha ou a terra; destruir gradualmente ou ser gradualmente destruído.
example: Public confidence in the government has eroded.

definition_en: A set of moral principles, especially ones relating to or affirming a specified group, field, or form of conduct.
definition_pt: Um conjunto de princípios morais, especialmente os relacionados ou que afirmam um grupo, campo ou forma de conduta especificados.
example: The medical profession has a strict code of ethics.

definition_en: Of or relating to a population subgroup with a common national or cultural tradition.
definition_pt: De ou relativo a um subgrupo populacional com uma tradição nacional ou cultural comum.
example: The city is known for its ethnic diversity.

definition_en: Plain or obvious; clearly seen or understood.
definition_pt: Claro ou óbvio; claramente visto ou entendido.
example: It was evident that she was unhappy.

definition_en: The gradual development of something, especially from a simple to a more complex form.
definition_pt: O desenvolvimento gradual de algo, especialmente de uma forma simples para uma mais complexa.
example: The book traces the evolution of the novel as a literary form.

definition_en: To publicly display a work of art or item of interest; to show a quality or symptom.
definition_pt: Exibir publicamente uma obra de arte ou item de interesse; mostrar uma qualidade ou sintoma.
example: The museum will exhibit paintings by local artists.

definition_en: Stated clearly and in detail, leaving no room for confusion or doubt.
definition_pt: Declarado de forma clara e detalhada, não deixando espaço para confusão ou dúvida.
example: He gave explicit instructions not to be disturbed.

definition_en: To make full use of and derive benefit from a resource; to use unfairly for one's own advantage.
definition_pt: Fazer pleno uso e obter benefício de um recurso; usar injustamente para vantagem própria.
example: We need to exploit this opportunity. / The workers were exploited.

definition_en: To send goods or services to another country for sale.
definition_pt: Enviar bens ou serviços para outro país para venda.
example: The country exports oil and natural gas.

definition_en: To make visible by uncovering; to reveal the truth about something.
definition_pt: Tornar visível descobrindo; revelar a verdade sobre algo.
example: The investigation exposed widespread corruption.

definition_en: Belonging to or forming the outer surface or structure of something; coming from outside.
definition_pt: Pertencente ou formando a superfície ou estrutura externa de algo; vindo de fora.
example: The external walls of the building need repair.

definition_en: To remove or take out, especially by effort or force; a short passage taken from a text or film.
definition_pt: Remover ou tirar, especialmente com esforço ou força; uma passagem curta tirada de um texto ou filme.
example: The dentist had to extract two teeth.

definition_en: To make an action or process easy or easier.
definition_pt: Tornar uma ação ou processo fácil ou mais fácil.
example: The new software facilitates data analysis.

definition_en: Having or relating to a system of government in which several states form a unity but remain independent in internal affairs.
definition_pt: Ter ou relacionar-se a um sistema de governo no qual vários estados formam uma unidade, mas permanecem independentes em assuntos internos.
example: The federal government is based in the capital.

definition_en: A payment made to a professional person or to a professional or public body in exchange for advice or services.
definition_pt: Um pagamento feito a uma pessoa profissional ou a um corpo profissional ou público em troca de aconselhamento ou serviços.
example: There's an admission fee for the museum.

definition_en: Coming at the end of a series; conclusive.
definition_pt: Chegando ao final de uma série; conclusivo.
example: This is your final warning.

definition_en: The way in which something is arranged or set out.
definition_pt: A maneira pela qual algo é organizado ou disposto.
example: The document is saved in PDF format.

definition_en: A mathematical relationship or rule expressed in symbols; a method or procedure for achieving something.
definition_pt: Uma relação ou regra matemática expressa em símbolos; um método ou procedimento para alcançar algo.
example: What's the formula for calculating the area of a circle?

definition_en: To establish or originate an institution or organization.
definition_pt: Estabelecer ou originar uma instituição ou organização.
example: The university was founded in the 15th century.

definition_en: The lowest load-bearing part of a building; an underlying basis or principle.
definition_pt: A parte inferior de suporte de carga de um edifício; uma base ou princípio subjacente.
example: This theory has no foundation in fact.

definition_en: An essential supporting structure of a building, vehicle, or object; a basic structure underlying a system or concept.
definition_pt: Uma estrutura de suporte essencial de um edifício, veículo ou objeto; uma estrutura básica subjacente a um sistema ou conceito.
example: We need a legal framework for this agreement.

definition_en: Forming a necessary base or core; of central importance.
definition_pt: Formando uma base ou núcleo necessário; de importância central.
example: Respect is fundamental to any relationship.

definition_en: In addition; besides (used to introduce a fresh consideration in an argument).
definition_pt: Além do mais; além disso (usado para introduzir uma nova consideração em um argumento).
example: The house is too small, and furthermore, it's too expensive.

definition_en: The state of being male or female; the members of one or other sex.
definition_pt: O estado de ser homem ou mulher; os membros de um ou outro sexo.
example: Discrimination on the basis of gender is illegal.

definition_en: To produce or create something.
definition_pt: Produzir ou criar algo.
example: The dam generates electricity for the entire region.

definition_en: All of the people born and living at about the same time; the production of something.
definition_pt: Todas as pessoas nascidas e vivendo aproximadamente na mesma época; a produção de algo.
example: My generation grew up without the internet.

definition_en: The earth; a spherical representation of the earth.
definition_pt: A terra; uma representação esférica da terra.
example: The company has offices across the globe.

definition_en: The object of a person's ambition or effort; an aim or desired result.
definition_pt: O objeto da ambição ou esforço de uma pessoa; um objetivo ou resultado desejado.
example: My goal is to learn French fluently.

definition_en: A particular level of rank, quality, proficiency, or value; to arrange in classes or categories.
definition_pt: Um nível particular de classificação, qualidade, proficiência ou valor; organizar em classes ou categorias.
example: What grade did you get on the test?

definition_en: To agree to give or allow something requested; a sum of money given by an organization for a particular purpose.
definition_pt: Concordar em dar ou permitir algo solicitado; uma soma de dinheiro dada por uma organização para um propósito específico.
example: The court granted him bail. / She received a research grant.

definition_en: A formal promise or assurance that certain conditions will be fulfilled; to provide such a promise.
definition_pt: Uma promessa ou garantia formal de que certas condições serão cumpridas; fornecer tal promessa.
example: The watch comes with a two-year guarantee.

definition_en: A general rule, principle, or piece of advice.
definition_pt: Uma regra geral, princípio ou conselho.
example: These are just guidelines, not strict rules.

definition_en: As a consequence; for this reason.
definition_pt: Como consequência; por esta razão.
example: The road was closed, hence the delay.

definition_en: A system in which members of an organization or society are ranked according to relative status or authority.
definition_pt: Um sistema no qual os membros de uma organização ou sociedade são classificados de acordo com o status ou autoridade relativa.
example: There's a clear hierarchy in the company.

definition_en: To emphasize something; an outstanding part of an event or period of time.
definition_pt: Enfatizar algo; uma parte excepcional de um evento ou período de tempo.
example: I'd like to highlight the importance of this decision.

definition_en: A supposition or proposed explanation made on the basis of limited evidence as a starting point for further investigation.
definition_pt: Uma suposição ou explicação proposta feita com base em evidências limitadas como ponto de partida para investigação adicional.
example: We're testing the hypothesis that the drug reduces inflammation.

definition_en: To establish or indicate who or what someone or something is.
definition_pt: Estabelecer ou indicar quem ou o que alguém ou algo é.
example: Can you identify the man in this photograph?

definition_en: A system of ideas and ideals, especially one which forms the basis of economic or political theory and policy.
definition_pt: Um sistema de ideias e ideais, especialmente um que forma a base da teoria e política econômica ou política.
example: Political ideology often influences economic policy.
